title: Must Justice Clarence Thomas Recuse Himself?
sub_head: Some argue that he and his wife, Ginni, now have an interest in Jan. 6 litigation.
body:
Ginni Thomas’s texts create at minimum the appearance of impropriety for Justice Clarence Thomas (“The Ginni Thomas Texts,” Review & Outlook, March 26). While the motivation behind the leaks should be questioned, the concerns they raise are part of the complete set of facts that you ultimately want to see from the Jan. 6 committee. Americans should weigh them, along with how Justice Thomas now chooses to act, in evaluating our system of justice.
Michael J. Solender
